thread.section_title: The Knife Merchant, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Knife Merchant, Inc | www.knifemerchant.com
thread.title: BSP
thread.title_full: The Knife Merchant, Inc reviewed by BSP

author: BSP
title: BSP
text: I recently purchased a FDick brand knife sharpening tool. I had seen the name on the knife sharpener belonging to an executive Chef friend of mine. He raved about it, so I wanted one and purchased it for myself. I am not disappointed. It makes my knives razor sharp! So much easier and safer to work in the kitchen with sharp knives.
